Description:
COLLECTING POOL OF CANDIDATES FOR OUR UPCOMING PROJECTS IN IRAQ!Responsibilities:Apply pesticides to remove harmful insects such as mosquitos, wasps, and ticks.
Conduct general maintenance duties such as cleaning walkways, fixing fountains, and other duties.
Apply fertilizer to help enhance growth.
Take out weeds and dead plants.
Trim overgrown limbs, hedges, and leaves.
Uphold the landscaping design and ensure plant growth.Skills
Skills:
High school diploma or equivalent qualification.
Must be able to operate maintenance equipment.
Strong knowledge of pest management and basic lawn maintenance.
